name: A Walk in the Park (S0L, TrevSaysHi)
name_original: A Walk in the Park (S0L, TrevSaysHi)
description:
Take your dogs on a walk in the park. Make it to the end and be sure to look out for those little squirrels!

Designed for an xbox controller. When your dogs see a squirrel, they will chase it and pull you with them. Mash the corresponding button to drain their energy and get them under control. Color of the dog corresponds to the color of the xbox controller button. (Blue = X, Yellow = Y, Green = A, Red = B)

Made in under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
